INSERT TAB 2.2.3 Disclosure and Notification of Security Breaches.

SFDC warrants that SFDC is not and has not been a party to any current, pending, threatened or resolved enforcement action of any government agency, or any consent decree or settlement with any governmental agency or private person or entity regarding any Security Breach or otherwise regarding data or information security.

INSERT TAB  In any notification to Customer required under this Section, SFDC shall designate one or more individuals employed by SFDC who will be available to Customer as a contact regarding such Security Breach.

SFDC shall (a) use commercially reasonable efforts to address and assist Customer with its reasonable concerns regarding such Security Breach and any dispute, inquiry or claim involving Customer that concerns such Security Breach; and (b) shall provide Customer with assurance reasonably satisfactory to Customer that reasonable steps have been taken to minimize and prevent the recurrence of similar Security Breaches.

Taking into account the nature of processing and the information available to SFDC, upon Customer’s written request, SFDC shall provide reasonable cooperation to Customer in its notification of the Supervisory Authority and, if applicable, Data Subjects, as those terms are defined in the DPA.Unless prohibited by an applicable statute or court order, SFDC shall also notify Customer of any third-party legal process relating to any such Security Breach, including, but not limited to, any legal process initiated by any governmental entity (foreign or domestic).

after text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, Customer may immediately terminate this Agreement upon notice if  (a) SFDC breaches the DPA or Section 2.2, (b) SFDC’s breach of Section 7 results in the unauthorized use or disclosure of Customer Data or (c) the damages limitation in Section 10.4 is exhausted.
Upon expiration or termination of this Agreement, SFDC will use commercially reasonable efforts to help Customer ensure a smooth transition to a new service provider or to Customer.
Billing-related notices to Customer will be addressed to the relevant billing contact designated by Customer in the Order Form
